name: Undisclosed Distribution Channels
title: Navia: Undisclosed Distribution Channels
in_play_description: After your Navia, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: Draw 2 Crystal Shrapnel cards. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Navia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Navia, equip this card.
After Navia equips this card, immediately use Ceremonial Crystalshot once.
After your Navia, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: Draw 2 Crystal Shrapnel cards. (Once per Round)
(You must have Navia in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
